GSD.product_version: versions from v5.5 to before v5.10.37
GSD.description:
drm/amd/display: Fix off by one in hdmi_14_process_transaction()

This is an automated ID intended to aid in discovery of potential security vulnerabilities. The actual impact and attack plausibility have not yet been proven.
This ID is fixed in Linux Kernel version v5.10.37 by commit 403c4528e5887af3deb9838cb77a557631d1e138, it was introduced in version v5.5 by commit 4c283fdac08abf3211533f70623c90a34f41d08d. For more details please see the references link.

OSV.summary: drm/amd/display: Fix off by one in hdmi_14_process_transaction()
